reviewText: I liked very much. The book handle different service situations: how it was and how it should be. I do recommend this video for first line service people.
While video included some good customer service principles and specific examples, it was a bit out dated.  Was useful for dicussion with groups.
Straight forward and simple for the employees to understand, not bad even for non-english native speakers as supported by obvious acting.

I am a supervisor at an academic law library, and I have used this tape as a supplement to my training of student workers, and I love it! It is brief - only 18 minutes - and affordable! It makes a great addition to teaching your workers what appropriate customer service really is.
